left_column.paragraph: Intuitive, code-free UI for business analysts to build and manage transformation rules
Available as a library to integrate with JBoss, Spring, WebLogic and SQL tools
Centralized repository of policies and transformation rules

right_column.paragraph: Easy organization and grouping of rules using rulebooks; Intuitive business UI for creation and management of rules and rulebooks.
Integrates with CDAP data pipelines for horizontal scalability

items.title: #BDAM: Introducing a Rules Engine for Big Data processing, by Nitin Motgi, Cask
#BDAM: Building an ECA Rules Engine for IoT with CDAP, by Bhooshan Mogal, Cask
